price: A powerful jinn said, “I will bring it to you before you rise up from your council, and I am strong enough and trustworthy.”
arabic: قَالَ عِفۡرِيتٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَۖ وَإِنِّي عَلَيۡهِ لَقَوِيٌّ أَمِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
